title: UFYB 152: Hope & Commitment
itunes:title: Hope & Commitment
description:
Are you feeling hopeless, afraid, despondent, or angry at the recent passing of Ruth Bader Ginsburg? In today’s podcast, I will teach you how to take hopeful action even when you aren’t FEELING hopeful, by using the coaching model to generate feelings of commitment. Hope feels good when it happens to arrive, but commitment will create a revolution.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/152
content:encoded:
Are you feeling hopeless, afraid, despondent, or angry at the recent passing of Ruth Bader Ginsburg? In today’s podcast, I will teach you how to take hopeful action even when you aren’t FEELING hopeful, by using the coaching model to generate feelings of commitment. Hope feels good when it happens to arrive, but commitment will create a revolution.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/152
itunes:subtitle: How the production of any feeling you want to experience is a discipline.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
